snippet.title: WANDERSTOP | PC, PS5 & Xbox Series X|S Launch Trailer
snippet.description:
Wanderstop is a narrative-centric cozy game about change and tea. Coming March 11, 2025 to Xbox Series X|S, PlayStation 5, PC on Steam. 

Play the demo and wishlist on Steam:  https://store.steampowered.com/app/1299460/Wanderstop/ 

Playing as a fallen fighter named Alta, you’ll manage a tea shop within a magical forest and tend to the customers who pass through. But Alta does not want to be here. And if she gets her way, the tea shop will be nothing but a brief and painful memory.

Developed by Ivy Road. Published by Annapurna Interactive.

© Annapurna Interactive, 2025
